  <!-- ===== STEP 2: Stress-Test Your Assessment ===== -->
  <div class="exp-step" data-step="2" style="display: none;">
    <div style="margin-bottom: 32px;">
      <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: 2px; color: #64748B; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 12px;">Activity 1</div>
      <h2 style="font-size: 22px; color: #E2E8F0; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Stress-Test Your Assessment</h2>
      <p style="color: #64748B; margin-bottom: 20px;">Before you can redesign, you need to understand the vulnerability. Enter an assessment brief below to see how AI might attempt it, and where that approach would fall short.</p>

      <div style="background: #16162A; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
        <label style="display: block; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 12px; color: #E2E8F0;">Paste or type your assessment brief:</label>
        <textarea id="assessment-brief" placeholder="Example: Write a 2000-word essay analysing the marketing strategy of a company of your choice. Include theory from weeks 1-6 and provide recommendations for improvement." style="width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; min-height: 120px; padding: 16px; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 8px; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; resize: vertical; background: #1E1E36; color: #E2E8F0;"></textarea>
        <button onclick="analyseAssessment()" style="margin-top: 16px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4F46E5, #7C3AED); color: white; border: none; padding: 12px 24px; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer;">Analyse Vulnerabilities</button>
      </div>

      <div id="vulnerability-analysis" style="display: none;">
        <div style="background: #3D2E0A; border: 1px solid #F59E0B; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px; margin-bottom: 16px;">

            <span style="font-size: 24px;">‚ö†Ô∏è</span>

              <strong style="color: #FBBF24;">How AI might approach this:</strong>

            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div style="background: #16162A; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px;">
          <h3 style="font-size: 16px; color: #E2E8F0; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Vulnerability Checklist</h3>
          <div id="vulnerability-checklist" style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 12px;"></div>
        </div>

        <div style="background: #0D2818; border: 1px solid #1A4731; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px; margin-top: 16px;">
          <strong style="color: #86EFAC;">The key insight:</strong>
          <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #4ADE80; line-height: 1.6;">Traditional assessments test whether students can produce content that sounds right. AI excels at this, including writing convincing reflections about its own output. Effective redesign shifts from policing AI use to designing for genuine engagement. The conversation itself becomes the evidence of thinking.</p>

  <!-- ===== STEP 3: Choose Your Pathway ===== -->
  <div class="exp-step" data-step="3" style="display: none;">
    <div style="margin-bottom: 32px;">
      <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: 2px; color: #64748B; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 12px;">Activity 2</div>
      <h2 style="font-size: 22px; color: #E2E8F0; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Choose Your Pathway</h2>
      <p style="color: #64748B; margin-bottom: 20px;">There's no single solution to AI-proofing assessments. Instead, consider three complementary approaches. Click each card to explore how it works and when to use it.</p>

      <div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 16px;">

        <!-- Pathway A: Process Documentation -->
        <div id="pathway-a" class="pathway-card" onclick="togglePathway('a')" style="background: #16162A; border: 2px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease;">
          <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 16px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
            <div style="background: #1E1B4B; width: 48px; height: 48px; border-radius: 12px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 24px;">üìù</div>
            <div style="flex: 1;">
              <h3 style="font-size: 18px; color: #E2E8F0; margin: 0;">Pathway A: Process Documentation</h3>
              <p style="font-size: 13px; color: #64748B; margin: 4px 0 0 0;">Show the journey, not just the destination</p>
            </div>
            <span id="pathway-a-arrow" style="font-size: 20px; color: #94A3B8; transition: transform 0.3s ease;">‚ñº</span>
          </div>
          <div id="pathway-a-content" style="display: none; padding-top: 16px; border-top: 1px solid #2D2D4A;">
            <p style="color: #CBD5E1; line-height: 1.7; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Instead of just submitting a final product, students submit the raw AI conversation alongside their work. The transcript <em>is</em> the evidence. You can see whether they challenged assumptions, asked follow-up questions, or just said "do this for me" and copied the result.</p>

            <div style="background: #16162A; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
              <strong style="color: #E2E8F0;">What students submit:</strong>
              <ul style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; padding-left: 20px; color: #CBD5E1; line-height: 1.8;">
                <li>Full AI conversation transcripts (not screenshots of selected prompts)</li>
                <li>Brief annotations pointing to moments where they steered, challenged, or refined the AI's output</li>
                <li>Evidence of iteration: more prompts means a richer transcript, not a rule violation</li>
              </ul>
            </div>

            <div style="background: #3D2E0A; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
              <strong style="color: #FBBF24;">Why not reflection?</strong>
              <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #FCD34D;">AI writes excellent reflections. A student can ask AI to critique its own output and produce a convincing "reflection" without any thinking happening. The conversation transcript is much harder to fake, and the thinking is visible in the interaction pattern itself.</p>
            </div>

            <div style="background: #0D2818; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
              <strong style="color: #86EFAC;">Best for:</strong>
              <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #4ADE80;">Written assignments, reports, case analyses, any task where the thinking process matters as much as the output.</p>
            </div>

            <div style="background: #1E1B4B; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px;">
              <strong style="color: #C7D2FE;">Example transformation:</strong>
              <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #A5B4FC; font-style: italic;">"Write a marketing plan" becomes "Submit your marketing plan along with your full AI conversation. Use AI as a thinking partner: ask it to challenge your assumptions, suggest factors you haven't considered, or debate whether your recommendations are realistic. I'm looking for conversation, not delegation."</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Pathway B: In-Class Components -->
        <div id="pathway-b" class="pathway-card" onclick="togglePathway('b')" style="background: #16162A; border: 2px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease;">
          <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 16px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
            <div style="background: #3D2E0A; width: 48px; height: 48px; border-radius: 12px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 24px;">üé§</div>
            <div style="flex: 1;">
              <h3 style="font-size: 18px; color: #E2E8F0; margin: 0;">Pathway B: In-Class Components</h3>
              <p style="font-size: 13px; color: #64748B; margin: 4px 0 0 0;">Demonstrate understanding in real-time</p>
            </div>
            <span id="pathway-b-arrow" style="font-size: 20px; color: #94A3B8; transition: transform 0.3s ease;">‚ñº</span>
          </div>
          <div id="pathway-b-content" style="display: none; padding-top: 16px; border-top: 1px solid #2D2D4A;">
            <p style="color: #CBD5E1; line-height: 1.7; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Add live components where students must demonstrate understanding without AI assistance, not as "gotcha" tests, but as opportunities to show mastery.</p>

            <div style="background: #16162A; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
              <strong style="color: #E2E8F0;">Formats that work:</strong>
              <ul style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; padding-left: 20px; color: #CBD5E1; line-height: 1.8;">
                <li><strong>Viva voce:</strong> 10-15 minute conversation about their submission</li>
                <li><strong>Real-time synthesis:</strong> Apply their work to a new scenario in class</li>
                <li><strong>Oral defense:</strong> Present findings and respond to questions</li>
                <li><strong>Peer review discussion:</strong> Explain and defend choices to classmates</li>
              </ul>
            </div>

            <div style="background: #0D2818; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
              <strong style="color: #86EFAC;">Best for:</strong>
              <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #4ADE80;">High-stakes assessments, verifying understanding of complex submissions, developing professional communication skills.</p>
            </div>

            <div style="background: #3D2E0A; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
              <strong style="color: #FBBF24;">Example transformation:</strong>
              <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #FCD34D; font-style: italic;">"Submit a business case" becomes "Submit your business case, then present the key recommendation in a 5-minute presentation where you'll respond to questions about your analysis."</p>
            </div>

            <div style="background: #1E1B4B; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px;">
              <strong style="color: #C7D2FE;">Want to go deeper with oral exams?</strong>
              <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #A5B4FC; line-height: 1.6;">The <a href="https://lms.curtin.edu.au/bbcswebdav/pid-14115339-dt-content-rid-91749310_1/orgs/The_AI_Skills_Passport/resources.html" target="_blank" style="color: #C7D2FE; text-decoration: underline;">AI Toolkit</a> includes a full <em>Oral Exams for an AI World</em> guide covering course design, logistics, rubrics, and managing student anxiety. Based on Hartmann (2025).</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Pathway C: Personal Application -->
        <div id="pathway-c" class="pathway-card" onclick="togglePathway('c')" style="background: #16162A; border: 2px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease;">
          <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 16px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
            <div style="background: #4A1942; width: 48px; height: 48px; border-radius: 12px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 24px;">üéØ</div>
            <div style="flex: 1;">
              <h3 style="font-size: 18px; color: #E2E8F0; margin: 0;">Pathway C: Personal Application</h3>
              <p style="font-size: 13px; color: #64748B; margin: 4px 0 0 0;">Connect to unique contexts AI cannot know</p>
            </div>
            <span id="pathway-c-arrow" style="font-size: 20px; color: #94A3B8; transition: transform 0.3s ease;">‚ñº</span>
          </div>
          <div id="pathway-c-content" style="display: none; padding-top: 16px; border-top: 1px solid #2D2D4A;">
            <p style="color: #CBD5E1; line-height: 1.7; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Design tasks that require information only the student has: their experiences, their data, their specific context. AI can help, but cannot replace the personal element.</p>

            <div style="background: #16162A; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
              <strong style="color: #E2E8F0;">Elements that create uniqueness:</strong>
              <ul style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; padding-left: 20px; color: #CBD5E1; line-height: 1.8;">
                <li>Specific local organizations or contexts</li>
                <li>Primary data the student collects themselves</li>
                <li>Personal work or volunteer experiences</li>
                <li>Connection to in-class discussions or activities</li>
              </ul>
            </div>

            <div style="background: #0D2818; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
              <strong style="color: #86EFAC;">Best for:</strong>
              <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #4ADE80;">Developing professional identity, connecting theory to practice, capstone projects, applied learning.</p>
            </div>

            <div style="background: #4A1942; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px;">
              <strong style="color: #F9A8D4;">Example transformation:</strong>
              <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #F472B6; font-style: italic;">"Analyse marketing strategy" becomes "Interview someone at an organization you're connected to about their marketing challenges, then develop recommendations using concepts from weeks 3-5."</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

      </div>

      <div style="background: #16162A; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px; margin-top: 20px;">
        <strong style="color: #E2E8F0;">Combining pathways:</strong>
        <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #64748B; line-height: 1.6;">These approaches work together. A strong AI-resilient assessment might combine personal application (Pathway C) with process documentation (Pathway A) and a brief oral component (Pathway B). Start with one, then layer as needed.</p>
      </div>

<script>
(function() {
  var experienceId = 'ai-proof-assessments';
  var TOTAL_STEPS = 6;
  var STORAGE_KEY = 'ai-passport-steps-ai-proof-assessments';
  var urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
  var uid = urlParams.get('uid') || 'anonymous';

  // Step names for progress bar
  var stepNames = ['', 'Welcome', 'Stress Test', 'Pathways', 'Redesign', 'Your Role', 'Wrap Up'];

  // ---- Step state ----
  var currentStep = 1;
  var highestCompleted = 0;

  function loadProgress() {
    try {
      var saved = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '{}');
      highestCompleted = saved.highestCompleted || 0;
      currentStep = saved.currentStep || 1;
      if (currentStep > highestCompleted + 1) currentStep = highestCompleted + 1;
    } catch (e) {
      highestCompleted = 0;
      currentStep = 1;
    }
  }

  function saveProgress() {
    localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, JSON.stringify({
      highestCompleted: highestCompleted,
      currentStep: currentStep
    }));
  }

  // ---- Progress bar rendering ----
  function renderProgressBar() {
    var bar = document.getElementById('progress-bar');
    var html = '';

    for (var i = 1; i <= TOTAL_STEPS; i++) {
      var isCompleted = i <= highestCompleted;
      var isCurrent = i === currentStep;
      var isLocked = i > highestCompleted + 1;

      // Connector line (before each step except the first)
      if (i > 1) {
        html += '<div style="flex: 1; max-width: 40px; height: 2px; background: ' +
          (i <= highestCompleted + 1 ? '#4F46E5' : '#2D2D4A') +
          '; align-self: center;"></div>';
      }

      // Step circle
      var bg, color, border, cursor, opacity;
      if (isCurrent) {
        bg = '#4F46E5'; color = 'white'; border = '2px solid #7C3AED'; cursor = 'default'; opacity = '1';
      } else if (isCompleted) {
        bg = '#0D2818'; color = '#22C55E'; border = '2px solid #22C55E'; cursor = 'pointer'; opacity = '1';
      } else {
        bg = '#1E1E36'; color = '#64748B'; border = '2px solid #2D2D4A'; cursor = 'default'; opacity = '0.5';
      }

      var clickHandler = isCompleted ? 'onclick="goToStep(' + i + ')"' : '';
      var title = isLocked ? 'Complete previous steps first' : stepNames[i];

      html += '<div ' + clickHandler + ' title="' + title + '" style="' +
        'width: 36px; height: 36px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; ' +
        'font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; flex-shrink: 0; transition: all 0.2s; ' +
        'background: ' + bg + '; color: ' + color + '; border: ' + border + '; cursor: ' + cursor + '; opacity: ' + opacity + ';">' +
        (isCompleted && !isCurrent ? '‚úì' : i) + '</div>';
    }

    bar.innerHTML = html;
  }

  // ---- Step navigation ----
  function showStep(step) {
    // Hide all steps
    document.querySelectorAll('.exp-step').forEach(function(el) {
      el.style.display = 'none';
    });

    // Show the target step
    var target = document.querySelector('.exp-step[data-step="' + step + '"]');
    if (target) {
      target.style.display = 'block';
    }

    currentStep = step;

    // Mark previous step as completed (if moving forward)
    if (step - 1 > highestCompleted) {
      highestCompleted = step - 1;
    }

    saveProgress();
    renderProgressBar();

    // Scroll to top of the experience
    document.getElementById('experience-app').scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' });
  }

  // Expose globally for onclick handlers
  window.goToStep = function(step) {
    // Allow: completed steps, current step, or advancing one step via Continue
    if (step >= 1 && step <= TOTAL_STEPS && step <= highestCompleted + 2) {
      showStep(step);
    }
  };

  // ---- Activity 1: Vulnerability Analysis ----
  window.analyseAssessment = function() {
    var brief = document.getElementById('assessment-brief').value.trim();
    if (!brief) {
      alert('Please enter an assessment brief to analyse.');
      return;
    }

    var analysisDiv = document.getElementById('vulnerability-analysis');
    analysisDiv.style.display = 'block';

    // Generate contextual analysis based on brief content
    var briefLower = brief.toLowerCase();
    var aiApproach = '';
    var vulnerabilities = [];

    // Detect assessment type and generate appropriate response
    if (briefLower.indexOf('essay') !== -1 || briefLower.indexOf('write') !== -1 || briefLower.indexOf('word') !== -1) {
      aiApproach = 'An AI could generate a well-structured essay with appropriate academic language, balanced arguments, and smooth transitions. It would produce content that "sounds right" but may lack genuine insight, specific local context, or authentic engagement with the topic.';
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üìù', text: 'Generic written output that sounds competent but lacks personal voice', risk: 'high' });
    }

    if (briefLower.indexOf('analyse') !== -1 || briefLower.indexOf('analysis') !== -1 || briefLower.indexOf('evaluate') !== -1) {
      aiApproach += ' For analysis tasks, AI can apply standard frameworks competently and identify obvious patterns, but may miss nuances that come from deep engagement with the material.';
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üîç', text: 'Surface-level analysis using standard frameworks without deeper insight', risk: 'high' });
    }

    if (briefLower.indexOf('case') !== -1 || briefLower.indexOf('company') !== -1 || briefLower.indexOf('business') !== -1) {
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üè¢', text: 'Generic company examples rather than specific local context', risk: 'medium' });
    }

    if (briefLower.indexOf('recommend') !== -1 || briefLower.indexOf('suggest') !== -1 || briefLower.indexOf('solution') !== -1) {
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üí°', text: 'Standard recommendations that could apply anywhere', risk: 'medium' });
    }

    if (briefLower.indexOf('theory') !== -1 || briefLower.indexOf('framework') !== -1 || briefLower.indexOf('concept') !== -1) {
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üìö', text: 'Textbook theory application without connection to specific course discussions', risk: 'medium' });
    }

    if (briefLower.indexOf('research') !== -1 || briefLower.indexOf('source') !== -1 || briefLower.indexOf('reference') !== -1) {
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üîó', text: 'AI may hallucinate references or use outdated sources', risk: 'high' });
    }

    // Default vulnerabilities
    if (vulnerabilities.length < 3) {
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: '‚ú®', text: 'Polished prose without evidence of learning process', risk: 'medium' });
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üéØ', text: 'No connection to in-class activities or discussions', risk: 'medium' });
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üó£Ô∏è', text: 'No way to verify student can explain or extend their work', risk: 'high' });
    }

    if (!aiApproach) {
      aiApproach = 'AI could produce a competent response that meets surface-level requirements, using appropriate academic language and structure. However, it would likely miss opportunities for genuine personal insight, specific contextual application, and evidence of the learning journey.';
    }

    document.getElementById('ai-approach').innerHTML = aiApproach;

    var checklistHtml = '';
    for (var vi = 0; vi < vulnerabilities.length; vi++) {
      var v = vulnerabilities[vi];
      var riskColors = {
        high: { bg: '#3B1010', border: '#EF4444', text: '#FCA5A5' },
        medium: { bg: '#3D2E0A', border: '#F59E0B', text: '#FBBF24' },
        low: { bg: '#0D2818', border: '#22C55E', text: '#4ADE80' }
      };
      var colors = riskColors[v.risk];
      checklistHtml +=
        '<div style="background: ' + colors.bg + '; border-left: 4px solid ' + colors.border + '; padding: 12px 16px; border-radius: 0 8px 8px 0;">' +
          '<span style="margin-right: 8px;">' + v.icon + '</span>' +
          '<span style="color: ' + colors.text + ';">' + v.text + '</span>' +
        '</div>';
    }

    document.getElementById('vulnerability-checklist').innerHTML = checklistHtml;

    // Scroll to analysis
    analysisDiv.scrollIntoView({ behaviour: 'smooth', block: 'start' });
  };

  // ---- Activity 2: Pathway cards toggle ----
  window.togglePathway = function(pathway) {
    var contentDiv = document.getElementById('pathway-' + pathway + '-content');
    var arrow = document.getElementById('pathway-' + pathway + '-arrow');
    var card = document.getElementById('pathway-' + pathway);

    var isOpen = contentDiv.style.display === 'block';

    // Close all pathways first
    var pathways = ['a', 'b', 'c'];
    for (var pi = 0; pi < pathways.length; pi++) {
      var p = pathways[pi];
      document.getElementById('pathway-' + p + '-content').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('pathway-' + p + '-arrow').style.transform = 'rotate(0deg)';
      document.getElementById('pathway-' + p).style.borderColor = '#2D2D4A';
    }

    // Open clicked one if it was closed
    if (!isOpen) {
      contentDiv.style.display = 'block';
      arrow.style.transform = 'rotate(180deg)';
      card.style.borderColor = '#4F46E5';
    }
  };

  // ---- Activity 3: Save redesign ----
  window.saveRedesign = function() {
    var redesign = {
      step1: document.getElementById('redesign-step-1').value,
      step2: document.getElementById('redesign-step-2').value,
      pathways: {
        a: document.getElementById('pathway-check-a').checked,
        b: document.getElementById('pathway-check-b').checked,
        c: document.getElementById('pathway-check-c').checked
      },
      step4: document.getElementById('redesign-step-4').value,
      savedAt: new Date().toISOString()
    };

    localStorage.setItem('ai-passport-redesign', JSON.stringify(redesign));

    var confirmation = document.getElementById('save-confirmation');
    confirmation.style.display = 'block';
    setTimeout(function() { confirmation.style.display = 'none'; }, 3000);
  };

  // Load saved redesign if exists
  function loadSavedRedesign() {
    var saved = localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-redesign');
    if (saved) {
      var redesign = JSON.parse(saved);
      if (redesign.step1) document.getElementById('redesign-step-1').value = redesign.step1;
      if (redesign.step2) document.getElementById('redesign-step-2').value = redesign.step2;
      if (redesign.pathways) {
        if (redesign.pathways.a) document.getElementById('pathway-check-a').checked = true;
        if (redesign.pathways.b) document.getElementById('pathway-check-b').checked = true;
        if (redesign.pathways.c) document.getElementById('pathway-check-c').checked = true;
      }
      if (redesign.step4) document.getElementById('redesign-step-4').value = redesign.step4;
    }
  }

  // ---- Tab switching ----
  window.switchTab = function(tab) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.context-tab').forEach(function(t) {
      if (t.dataset.tab === tab) {
        t.style.background = '#4F46E5';
        t.style.color = 'white';
        t.style.fontWeight = 'bold';
      } else {
        t.style.background = '#1E1E36';
        t.style.color = '#64748B';
        t.style.fontWeight = 'normal';
      }
    });

    document.querySelectorAll('.tab-panel').forEach(function(p) {
      p.style.display = p.dataset.panel === tab ? 'block' : 'none';
    });
  };

  // ---- Completion tracking ----
  var badges = {
    1: { emoji: 'üß™', name: 'Explorer' },
    3: { emoji: 'üß†', name: 'Thinker' },
    5: { emoji: 'üõ†Ô∏è', name: 'Builder' },
    7: { emoji: 'üèÜ', name: 'Champion' }
  };

  window.recordCompletion = function() {
    var btn = document.getElementById('complete-btn');
    btn.disabled = true;
    btn.textContent = 'Recording...';
    btn.style.background = '#94A3B8';

    // Mark final step as completed
    highestCompleted = TOTAL_STEPS;
    saveProgress();
    renderProgressBar();

    saveToLocalStorage();
    showCompletionSuccess();
  };

  function saveToLocalStorage() {
    var completions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-completions') || '{}');
    completions[experienceId] = {
      completedAt: new Date().toISOString(),
      uid: uid
    };
    localStorage.setItem('ai-passport-completions', JSON.stringify(completions));
  }

  function showCompletionSuccess() {
    document.getElementById('completion-trigger').style.display = 'none';
    document.getElementById('completion-section').style.display = 'block';

    var completions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-completions') || '{}');
    var completedCount = Object.keys(completions).length;

    var badgeHtml = '';
    var nextBadge = null;

    for (var count in badges) {
      if (completedCount >= parseInt(count)) {
        badgeHtml += '<span style="font-size: 24px; margin: 0 4px;" title="' + badges[count].name + '">' + badges[count].emoji + '</span>';
      } else if (!nextBadge) {
        nextBadge = { count: parseInt(count), emoji: badges[count].emoji, name: badges[count].name };
      }
    }

    var progressText = '<div style="margin-bottom: 8px;">' + (badgeHtml || '<span style="color: #94A3B8;">Start your collection!</span>') + '</div>';
    progressText += '<p style="font-size: 13px; color: #64748B; margin: 0;">' + completedCount + ' experience' + (completedCount !== 1 ? 's' : '') + ' completed</p>';

    if (nextBadge) {
      progressText += '<p style="font-size: 12px; color: #94A3B8; margin: 4px 0 0 0;">Next badge: ' + nextBadge.emoji + ' ' + nextBadge.name + ' (' + (nextBadge.count - completedCount) + ' more)</p>';
    }

    document.getElementById('badge-progress').innerHTML = progressText;
  }

  function checkExistingCompletion() {
    var completions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-completions') || '{}');
    if (completions[experienceId]) {
      document.getElementById('completion-trigger').innerHTML =
        '<div style="color: #22C55E; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 8px;">‚úì</div>' +
        '<p style="font-size: 14px; color: #64748B; margin: 0;">You completed this experience on ' + new Date(completions[experienceId].completedAt).toLocaleDateString() + '</p>';
    }
  }

  // ---- Initialise ----
  loadProgress();
  renderProgressBar();
  showStep(currentStep);
  loadSavedRedesign();
  checkExistingCompletion();
})();
</script>
